verses.kjv: How beautiful are thy feet with shoes, O prince’s daughter! the joints of thy thighs are like jewels, the work of the hands of a cunning workman.
verses.ct: How gorgeous your sandaled feet are, daughter of a prince! The curves of your hips are like jewels shaped by a master craftsman.

verses.kjv: Thy navel is like a round goblet, which wanteth not liquor: thy belly is like an heap of wheat set about with lilies.
verses.ct: Your navel is like a rounded cup that never lacks wine. Your waist is like a mound of wheat surrounded by lilies.

verses.kjv: Thy two breasts are like two young roes that are twins.
verses.ct: Your breasts are like twin fawns, a matching pair.

verses.kjv: Thy neck is as a tower of ivory; thine eyes like the fishpools in Heshbon, by the gate of Bathrabbim: thy nose is as the tower of Lebanon which looketh toward Damascus.
verses.ct: Your neck is like a tower of ivory. Your eyes are like the pools in Heshbon, near the gate of Bath-rabbim. Your nose is like the tower of Lebanon that faces toward Damascus.

verses.kjv: Thine head upon thee is like Carmel, and the hair of thine head like purple; the king is held in the galleries.
verses.ct: Your head crowns you like Mount Carmel, and the flowing hair on your head is like royal purple — a king is captivated by your tresses.

verses.kjv: How fair and how pleasant art thou, O love, for delights!
verses.ct: How beautiful and delightful you are, my love, with all your charms!

verses.kjv: This thy stature is like to a palm tree, and thy breasts to clusters of grapes.
verses.ct: Your figure is like a palm tree, and your breasts are like clusters of fruit.

verses.kjv: I said, I will go up to the palm tree, I will take hold of the boughs thereof: now also thy breasts shall be as clusters of the vine, and the smell of thy nose like apples;
verses.ct: I thought, 'I will climb that palm tree and take hold of its branches.' Let your breasts be like clusters on the vine, and the fragrance of your breath like apples,

verses.kjv: And the roof of thy mouth like the best wine for my beloved, that goeth down sweetly, causing the lips of those that are asleep to speak.
verses.ct: and your kisses like the finest wine — flowing smoothly for my beloved, gliding over the lips of those drifting to sleep.

verses.kjv: I am my beloved’s, and his desire is toward me.
verses.ct: I belong to my beloved, and his longing is for me.

verses.kjv: Come, my beloved, let us go forth into the field; let us lodge in the villages.
verses.ct: Come, my beloved, let's go out to the countryside. Let's spend the night in the villages.

verses.kjv: Let us get up early to the vineyards; let us see if the vine flourish, whether the tender grape appear, and the pomegranates bud forth: there will I give thee my loves.
verses.ct: Let's rise early and visit the vineyards. Let's see if the vines have bloomed, if the young grapes have appeared, and if the pomegranates are in blossom. There I will give you my love.

verses.kjv: The mandrakes give a smell, and at our gates are all manner of pleasant fruits, new and old, which I have laid up for thee, O my beloved.
verses.ct: The mandrakes send out their fragrance, and at our doors is every kind of delicious fruit, both new and old, that I have saved for you, my beloved.
